name: Dark Chaser: Idle RPG
description:
Clear simple quest and earn gold.
Level up Mercenaries with gold and clear stages!
Collect various Mercenaries and Items!
Challenge daily missions!
If the stages gets hard, [Reborn] to get more Mercenaries or Level up Specialties!

[Features]
- An idle game that gets stronger automatically!
- Clear Quests easily by just clicking the button!
- Reborn and get stronger!
- Over 100 Characters!
- can play even without network!
- supports tablet screen
- supports 14 languages
